website_summaries.verdict: It's a cool science lesson and a Bluetooth speaker all in one.
pros: Build a Bluetooth speaker with Bose-quality sound
Personalize it with cool lights and interchangeable covers
Included app (for Apple devices) guides you through hands-on activities
Works with any device with Bluetooth 3.0 or higher – iOS compatibility is just for assembly app
cons: Dfificult to assemble without access to iOS app

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for my son. When he first opened the box, he was visibly disappointed. We downloaded the app for him to follow the instructions, and he built the speaker on his own. He was stepped through the process, learning things, and able to experiment all the way. By the time he was done, he was excited about the speaker, and the amazing sound.
customer_reviews.author: Crista N. Nimmerichter

customer_reviews.title: Great app for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Bose made a great product for kids who love science. Besides the components needed for building the speaker, there are other components for educational purposes only, and we had tons of fun learning together. The speaker has high sound quality, as expected from Bose... Overall, it gave me the opportunity to spend few hours with my 10YO daughter, and both of us had fun.
customer_reviews.author: O. Nissan

customer_reviews.title: They love the pulsing colored lights
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to grandchildren for Xmas. It went together quickly...maybe too quickly although both of the kids (7 and 8) are mechanical and had help from older siblings. They love the pulsing colored lights.
customer_reviews.author: KBArch

customer_reviews.title: NO android app
customer_reviews.text: Yes I should have read the fine print before buying for a grandchild. I could not believe there was no android app. Apple is ONLY 15% of the market, why they did not make a app for android also is beyond me. My Bose QC-25's direct connect to google voice command. Speaker works for Bluetooth but the education is what I wanted...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for kids at a great sale price
customer_reviews.text: My son is very pleased with his Bose speaker. Means so much more to him since he built it. With the detailed instructions, it was easy assembly for my 9 year old. Much better sound than his iPhone so it’s a winner for us. This kit does a much better job than most kits by actually explaining the science behind how speakers work. Good job, Bose.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound / Neat STEM-learning Item
customer_reviews.text: Neat Christmas gift / project for my son and me to build and teach him about how speakers reproduce sound. Great sound quality, as per standard Bose experience. Neat LED color display. My 11-year old son wasn't "in to" installing the die cut panel cover inserts (various designs included w/kit).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The build-exercises are absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic hobby speaker to put together with a curious child, especially if that child loves music. You actually build two speakers, the first is made of paper and the second is the one pictured on the box. The tutorials walk you through all of it and the exercises explain how speakers work and why they're built like they are. They're fantastic, utterly enchanting. I cannot recommend this unit enough: it is worth the money and the time. Also, at the end of it you get a cool speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Education and a Bose Speaker. What’s Not To Like?
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome kit. My oldest son knew some of the basics here, but he was able to teach our youngest about sound and how the speaker works. They experimented with the app and had fun putting it together. At the end of that, you still have a great Bose speaker that is customizable.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie1201

customer_reviews.title: Huge rich sound.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson for Christmas. He put it together, synced it to his cell phone and commenced playing tunes. What a great sound! The high notes are clean, the mid range is rich, and the bass is incredibly full and BIG! Fantastic. He love it so it’s definitely giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Siverling

customer_reviews.title: my 7 year old loved this
customer_reviews.text: This was a really fun project to do with my daughter and when it was finished, she had a really nice sounding speaker for the money. She has it connected to her Alexa Dot and it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Beech

customer_reviews.title: Well done Bose!
customer_reviews.text: Great Xmas Day learning project for my 10 year old. The build app is very educational and takes a couple of hours. Once we were done he has an awesome sounding Bluetooth speaker. At the sale price of $69 this is a great buy. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steely

customer_reviews.title: Truly a STEM teaching tool and great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit as soon as it was opened! The funny thing, even the adults were interested in seeing this being made! My only complaint was that this should also have an Android app for the instructional videos/games. Folks this truly instructs kids on how speakers work and how the sound wave comes out, but only with Apple products. Only complaint. That being said, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: idfcv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Educational, fun, well made. I don’t understand the 1 star review saying it was cheaply made. This is a better speaker than my own Bluetooth speaker. Very good all around speaker and piece of engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great project and the sound is booming. Would be perfect if it were rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: WHIPPAH

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 yr old said it has been the best gift has has gotten in a long time! And that says a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Had a great time with my kid! One of the best purchases I’ve made for my kids for S.T.E.M.
customer_reviews.author: Txfirebrat

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for my 13 year old son, he enjoyed putting the speaker together and the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: App with instructions only available in US App Store.
customer_reviews.text: Got one for each of our kids this christmas. However haven’t been able to use them since the app with instructions is only available in US app store. (We are outside US).
customer_reviews.author: Carolina P.

customer_reviews.title: Value, fun, learning, and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 10 year old as a Hanukkah gift. He was over the moon. The speaker was super fun to put together, and the sound and lights are gorgeous. Really incredible value and an amazingly fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Fun educational product for my 11 year son to do independently and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these! They had them assembled in minutes and now use them every day. The speakers sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Peters

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. The sound is very good. It’s better than amazon echo plus 2. I am very surprised by it
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Built it with a friend and had a great time with the building components
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Built it with a friend and had a great time with the building components.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and educational project for kids & parents
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun and learning. The video guide is very educational. Great sound and cool lights.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quashnock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old is very techy. Enjoyed putting it together. A bit pricy but it makes up in sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nursing student (George S)

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a tech person who is tough to shop for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Christmas Gifts
customer_reviews.text: Three speakers built by boys 10 and 12--by themselves without problems. The 8-year old needed a little help. All three boys love the versatility of the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Glaim

customer_reviews.title: They work great. Can be taken apart to play around with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and nephew. They them. They work great. Can be taken apart to play around with over and over. A bit bass-y but sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Hookd

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Boys loved playing and learning with the speaker! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun to put together with your child and sounds ok ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun to put together with your child and sounds ok for the same person you put it together with.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: Great purches
customer_reviews.text: My brother loved this and it looks great ax well
customer_reviews.author: Colin Powers

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and learned a few things about how sound ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He loved it and learned a few things about how sound is made. I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Keith Blazek

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is awsome.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with the sound quality. It's very good with this kind of price.
customer_reviews.author: kwok k chan

customer_reviews.title: The smooth sounds
customer_reviews.text: My grandson put it together easily and enjoys it. The sound is good as one would expect from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R

customer_reviews.title: He is really into speakers and he has really enjoyed building and playing this speaker as it has great ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9yr old grandson for Christmas.He is really into speakers and he has really enjoyed building and playing this speaker as it has great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, and very creative for my 11 y/o son to build. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but great project for younger child. 10YO boy, in my case. LOVED the experience.
customer_reviews.author: MGMc in Philly

customer_reviews.title: My grandson very much enjoyed building the Speaker Cube and it seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson very much enjoyed building the Speaker Cube and it seems to be working quite well for him so far.
customer_reviews.author: garden lover

customer_reviews.title: Good project for kids
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice project for kids. The sound quality is not of a regular Bose but not bad. Nice present to make or to get.
customer_reviews.author: Dorel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nine year truly enjoyed building the speaker and learning about sound waves. And, the speaker sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Goodson

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 11 year old twin daughters and we loved putting it together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 11 year old twin daughters and we loved putting it together. It was fun, educational, and sounds and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: and now our kitchen has a great Bose speaker
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old had a blast building this, and now our kitchen has a great Bose speaker. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: S. James

customer_reviews.title: They enjoyed the challenge and love the
customer_reviews.text: It was a family gift to my sister and her children. They enjoyed the challenge and love the cube
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A price point failure
customer_reviews.text: This kit is twice the price it should be. The teaching aspect of the project is nice and provided plenty of opportunity to learn and discuss the physics of sound/light. The speaker is VERY small and the cone has NO PROTECTION so for $150 you get a science experience and a nice small delicate speaker. Bose has always over priced their products and I feel stupid to have paid this much for this product. I expect this product to be blown out at some point at a third of the original price.
customer_reviews.author: BillWhopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I do not write very many reviews, but when I do it's generally because I either think the product is absolutely 100% a P.O.S. or it's the best thing since sliced bread. This product made me feel like I was a kid again with my son building it. Truly 100% AWESOME JOB BOSE! I can't say enough about the learning experience for both my son and I. Well worth every penny and I will be buying one for my daughter and myself soon not mention it's definitely going to be the gift I buy for all the kids in my family. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any kid or adult
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for any kid or adult. It's a fun and educational project to create the speaker and the customization makes it something to come back to later. The sound is great and size is very portable. The one thing that would make it better is to have it be rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: She built it all by herself too she is in 6 th grade The soul is awesome. It was very educational and they bought learned ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one for our grandson who is a junior in high school. He had it built and using it Christmas Day. The second we purchased for our grand daughter. She built it all by herself too she is in 6 th grade The soul is awesome. It was very educational and they bought learned something about how speakers work
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 11yo LOVED this Christmas present. Good quality sound & he had a blast learning about sound etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Z. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my grandson!!!!  What a nice eduational surprise.
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product. My grandson got this for Christmas. He is nine. He LOVED putting it together and he is so proud. He did not have any help. He has built lots of Legos and he found it very easy. Great sound. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but pretty darn cool.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. a fun built for a child or someone Into gadgets or electronics. Not really experiments that you would repeat but fun none the less. And when it's all don't you have a very usable Bluetooth speaker with surprisingly good sound quality. Pricey for what it is but not at all unhappy. Will likely buy some for nieces and nephews. 4 star due to price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Simple but cool - I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: You experiment with included parts to show how speakers work - very cool! You then put aside those parts to build the speaker. I was somewhat disappointed as its pretty much a few plugs and snapping on the case to build the actual speaker. Speaker sounds great but I really with it was rechargeable and did not need to be always plugged in to the power outlet.
customer_reviews.author: katiekw

customer_reviews.title: Hole in box
customer_reviews.text: It came with a large hole in the side of the box. Not sure if this occured during transit so I don't want to rate that low based on this. Nothing inside was affected but it's supposed to be a gift :/
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not for android
customer_reviews.text: Not for android! It will play through an android, but all of the learning experiments must use IOS. This isn't stated anywhere until you get it unboxed on Christmas morning. Shame on you, Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Good sounds
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grand son (9 years old). Had good time building... & liked the concept.
customer_reviews.author: Mariecat B.

product_meta.title: Bose BOSEbuild Speaker Cube - A Build-it-yourself Bluetooth Speaker for Kids
feature_bullets: Build a Bluetooth speaker with Bose-quality sound
Personalize your Speaker Cube with cool lights and interchangeable covers
Included app (for Apple devices) guides you through hands-on activities
Explore speaker components (coil, magnet and paper) and learn how they make sound
Intended for Children 8 and older. Compatibility-Wireless- Any device with Bluetooth 3.0 or higher (including Android devices, laptops, etc). Wired- Any device with a 3.5mm audio output

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars153 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
